subject: Delayed shipment for Order CH-1003
description: Hi, I placed an order 5 days ago (CH-1003) and it still shows as processing. Can you please provide an update on the shipping status?

messages.content: Hi, I placed an order 5 days ago (CH-1003) and it still shows as processing. Can you please provide an update on the shipping status?

Hi James, thank you for contacting us. I've checked your order CH-1003 and can see that one item (GMT Navigator) shipped yesterday via UPS. The second item (Minute Repeater) is currently being prepared and should ship within 1-2 business days. I'll send you tracking information shortly.

subject: Question about watch water resistance
description: I'm considering purchasing the Ocean Explorer. Can you tell me if it's suitable for swimming and diving?

messages.content: I'm considering purchasing the Ocean Explorer. Can you tell me if it's suitable for swimming and diving?

Hi Victoria! The Ocean Explorer is an excellent choice for water activities. It has a 300m water resistance rating, making it perfect for swimming, snorkeling, and recreational diving. The unidirectional rotating bezel helps track elapsed time underwater. It's also ISO 6425 certified as a professional dive watch.
Perfect! That's exactly what I was looking for. Thank you for the detailed information.

subject: Warranty claim for Chronomaster Elite
description: The crown on my Chronomaster Elite (purchased 8 months ago) has become loose and won't screw down properly. I'd like to initiate a warranty claim.

messages.content: The crown on my Chronomaster Elite (purchased 8 months ago) has become loose and won't screw down properly. I'd like to initiate a warranty claim.

Hello Robert, I'm sorry to hear about the issue with your Chronomaster Elite. This is certainly covered under our lifetime warranty. Could you please provide your order number or the serial number of the watch so I can locate your purchase record?
Internal note: Check warranty database for recent crown issues with Chronomaster Elite batch CHR-2023-Q2

subject: Return request for Art Deco Square
description: I received the Art Deco Square yesterday but it's not quite what I expected. The size is smaller than I thought it would be. Can I return it?

messages.content: I received the Art Deco Square yesterday but it's not quite what I expected. The size is smaller than I thought it would be. Can I return it?

subject: Billing inquiry about payment method
description: I was charged twice for my recent order. My credit card shows two transactions for the same amount.

messages.content: I was charged twice for my recent order. My credit card shows two transactions for the same amount.

Hi David, I sincerely apologize for this billing issue. I'm escalating this to our billing department immediately to resolve the duplicate charge. You should see a refund within 3-5 business days. I'll monitor this personally and update you daily until it's resolved.
